We will get back to you soon.'); setFormData({ name: '', email: '', phone: '', subject: '', message: '' }); }; const locations = [ { name: 'MKit One Noida - Sector 18', address: 'No.18, 41, EVK Sampath Rd, Vepery, Periyamet, 600 007.', city: 'Chennai, Tamil Nadu', phone: '+91 84050 84050', email: 'support@gofix.co.in', hours: 'Mon-Sat: 10:30 AM - 09:30 PM', mapUrl: 'https://maps.google.com/embed?pb=!1m18!1m12!1m3!1d3888.0!2d77.2090!3d28.5355!2m3!1f0!2f0!3f0!3m2!1i1024!2i768!4f13.1!3m3!1m2!1s0x0%3A0x0!2zMjjCsDMyJzA3LjgiTiA3N8KwMTInMzIuNCJF!5e0!3m2!1sen!2sin!4v1234567890' } ]; return (
